722615f-a.text:
Platt Street, north side, west from but not including Pearl, to and including William Streets, showing a clearance in the foreground upon which will rise a 35-story structure. The first two buildings (Nos. 3 and 5) west of the clearance will be demolished and replaced by a new 3-story office building according to the New York Times of December 8, 1937. This structure will estend through the block to front on John Street, upon which it will be known as No. 110.

July 8, 1930.
P.L. Sperr.
722615f-a.folder: Platt Street & Pearl Street, Manhattan, NY
